version_description:
- App exit Auto play speed is 40% increased
- A New Character Grade (LR grade)
- Gold reward from AD is 60% increased
- 200 additional reincarnation stones are given When the characters reincarnated.
- Added a new limited package (Ruby package)
- The package items will refresh every 1st day of the month
- bug fixes

- App exit Auto play speed is 40% increased
- A New Character Grade (LR grade)
- Gold reward from AD is 60% increased
- 200 additional reincarnation stones are given When the characters reincarnated.
- Added a new limited package (Ruby package)
- The package items will refresh every 1st day of the month
- bug fixes

Added 1 New Package
Bug fixes and Game improvements.

- User data link to the account
- New package items( 2 pcs )
- New character upgrade system
- Max limits increased
- 5 new daily missions
- Arena difficulty adjustment
- UX enhancement & Bug fix

- New skill system "Party Skill"
- Transcend enabled characters 20 -> 30
- New package items( 2 pcs )
- UX enhancement & Bug fix

- Arena improvement
- Add golden key ad
- Ad improvements
- Bug fixes

Added 1 New Package
Bug fixes and Game improvements.

- Add "Raid"
- Max level extension
- Max stage extension
- Bug Fixed

- Fever Mode Unlock Lv28 -> Lv11
- Login Reward improvements
- Tutorial improvements
- Bug fixes
